name: English Stories AudioBook (offline + Audio) free
description: English Stories AudioBook Offline is completely offline english story book app with over 1500+ moral stories in multiple categories with moral lessons. English Stories with audios is a free application, this app provide you many stories with audio. English Stories AudioBook will help you relax after a work hard day. If you are a English learner, you can use this app to learn. This app speaks to us daily with good stories allowing us to share and enrich the world with a collaborative experience.  Why delay then, download the app and use it offline   + Moral Stories + Classic Stories + Animal Stories + 1001 nights + Brothers Grimm + charles perrault + Greek Stories +World Fairytales + Christmas Stories + Audio Stories + Adventures Stories + Aesops Fables   Please rate this app if you like.
